dt: {bc}occurring without loss or gain of heat

et: Greek {it}adiábatos{/it} "impassable" (from {it}a-{/it} {et_link|a-:2|a-:2} + {it}diabatós{/it} "to be crossed, fordable," verbal adjective of {it}diabaínein{/it} "to step across, pass over," from {it}dia-{/it} {et_link|dia-|dia-} + {it}baínein{/it} "to walk, step") + {et_link|-ic:1|-ic:1} {ma}{mat|come:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: occurring without loss or gain of heat
